author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Last year's massive server breach at Pokémon developer Game Freak is still providing fresh leaks of info. A new dump of leaked material not only provided early looks at the upcoming Pokémon Legends: Z-A, but also details on unannounced projects and even new Pokémon species. The leaks also suggest the new Gen 11 games are aiming to be released in 2030. In other news, Microsoft is adamant that they're not giving up on console hardware by showing off the lab where the ROG Xbox Ally X was tested, and where the next generation Xbox is being prototyped. And finally, Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella spoke with GQ, reflecting on his career and admitting that CoD only exists because "EA were dicks."

#IGN #Gaming #Pokemon
title: Pokémon 'Teraleak' Reveals Franchise's Plans Through 2030 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Release Date Trailer for Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films, a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the Avatar films. Explore the process of developing Avatar: The Way of Water and a first look at the upcoming Avatar: Fire and Ash with Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films premiering November 7, exclusively on Disney+.

The two-part documentary details the filmmaker's travels from Manhattan Beach, San Pedro, Shasta Lake, and the Channel Islands to the Bahamas, Hawaii, and New Zealand, to follow the cast and below-the-line team as they work to hone and perfect the techniques of underwater performance capture technology and learn to free dive in a massive, state-of-the-art 680,000-gallon water tank.

Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films premieres on November 7, exclusively on Disney+.

#IGN
title: Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films - Official Release Date Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Release Window Trailer for Sonic Rumble, a free-to-play multiplayer battle royale developed by SEGA. Players will compete to race across multiple stages and take down bosses to rise as the victor. Sonic Rumble is launching in November for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Sonic Rumble - Official Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the CRKD x Gibson collaboration trailer, as CRKD has partnered with Gibson to create the iconic Les Paul Cherry Sunburst Collectors Edition Guitar Controller, designed for multi-platform play. The CRKD Gibson Les Paul Cherry Sunburst Collector's Edition Guitar Controller is fully compatible with PC, handheld PCs, Nintendo Switch 1 and Nintendo Switch 2, Android devices (including smart TVs, tablets and mobile), plus cloud gaming services such as Xbox Cloud Gaming and Luna. Additionally, with KeyJam Mode, it also unlocks compatibility with Fortnite Festival on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S. Orders are open now for the CRKD x Gibson Les Paul Cherry Sunburst Collectors Edition Guitar Controller.

Features of the Collector's Edition include a high-gloss lacquered Cherry Sunburst finish with a pickguard seamlessly built into the artwork. The back features a stainless-steel Gibson x CRKD Collector’s Edition medallion, laser-engra
title: CRKD x Gibson - Official Les Paul Cherry Sunburst CE Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Get another look at Luto in this latest trailer, and see what some critics are saying about this psychological horror game, where you take on the role of someone unable to leave their home. In Luto, every attempt to escape will lead you deeper into the unknown, where nothing is as it seems and everything will test your senses. Luto is available now on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).
title: Luto - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Wicked and Good' Featurette for Wicked: For Good, the sequel to the hit musical film distributed by Universal Pictures. Don't miss the latest featurette covering the different dynamics of Elphaba and Glinda as they settle into their historically iconic roles alongside the new film, acting as the bridge between the story of Wicked and The Wizard of Oz. Wicked: For Good is in theaters on November 21.

Directed once again by award-winning director Jon M. Chu and starring the spectacular returning cast, led by Academy Award® nominated superstars Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, the final chapter of the untold story of the witches of Oz begins with Elphaba and Glinda estranged and living with the consequences of their choices. 

Elphaba (Cynthia Erivo), now demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, lives in exile, hidden within the Ozian forest while continuing her fight for the freedom of Oz’s silenced Animals and desperately trying to expose the truth she knows about
title: Wicked: For Good - Official 'Wicked and Good' Featurette (2025) Ariana Grande, Cynthia Erivo

author: IGN
title: The weird reason she loses her hair in Bugonia #ignfanfest

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Season 3 First Look Clip for Prehistoric Planet: Ice Age, a five-part natural history event series distributed by Apple TV and narrated by Tom Hiddleston. Don't miss a look at this new clip from Prehistoric Planet: Ice Age, streaming on November 26 exclusively on Apple TV.

Prehistoric Planet combines award-winning wildlife filmmaking, the latest paleontology learnings and state-of-the-art technology to unveil the spectacular habitats and inhabitants of ancient Earth for a one-of-a-kind immersive experience. 

The series is produced by the world-renowned team at BBC Studios Natural History Unit with support from the photorealistic visual effects of MPC (“The Lion King,” “The Jungle Book”) applied to concept art created by Jellyfish Pictures (“The Book of Boba Fett,” “Spirit: Untamed”). “Prehistoric Planet” season two continues to bring Earth’s history to life like never before as the series presents new dinosaurs, new habitats, and new scientific discoveries while taking vie
title: Prehistoric Planet: Ice Age - Official Season 3 First Look Clip (2025)

description:
Get a peek at customization options and a sampling of gorgeous forged weapons in this latest Bladesong trailer for this upcoming swordmaking game. In Bladesong, forge unique weapons with freeform blade shaping and modular hilts, perfectly balanced to your customers’ needs. Master the art of smithing and uncover the secrets of Eren Keep, a last haven of a dying world – or so they say. Bladesong will be available on PC in 2025, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN
title: Bladesong - Official Weapons Showcase Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Behind the Scenes Gameplay Trailer for Mouse: P.I. For Hire, a stylized first-person shooter developed by Fumi Games. Players can hear straight from the developers about the creation of Mouse: P.I. For Hire with hand-drawn animations, the signature 1930s cartoon aesthetic, and more. Mouse: P.I. For Hire is coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam), with a full deep dive coming on October 28.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire - Official Behind the Scenes Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
A reimagining of the controversial 1984 cult horror classic – When Billy witnesses his parents’ grisly murder on Christmas Eve at the hands of Santa, it ignites a lifelong mission to spread holiday fear. Every Christmas, he dons the jolly red suit and delivers a blood-soaked massacre to feed his twisted sense of justice. This Christmas Eve, Billy wants to know: “Have you been naughty?”

Silent Night, Deadly Night opens in theaters December 12, 2025.

#IGN
title: Silent Night, Deadly Night Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Join members of the development team from Skybound Games for a deep dive into Cecil Stedman, the playable character recently revealed to be joining the roster of the upcoming 3vs3 tag fighting game, Invincible VS. Go behind-the-scenes with the development team to see Cecil in action, get a breakdown of the Director of the GDA's movesets, special moves, attacks, and more. The team also gives fighting tips on how to use Cecil in battle. Invincible VS will be available in 2026 on Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. Registration for an upcoming Invincible VS Closed Alpha in 2025 is available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Invincible VS - Official Cecil Behind-The-Scenes Featurette | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Release Date Trailer for Skopje '83, a first-person roguelike cell-shaded shooter developed by Dark-1. Players will scavenge, loot, and defeat enemies and bosses alike in a hostile city from run to run. Skopje '83 is launching on November 7 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Skopje '83 - Official Gameplay Release Date Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Go behind the scenes of MARVEL Cosmic Invasion with game director Frederic Gemus, writer Yannick Belzil, and producer Rémi Lavoie from Tribute Games. Learn how the team built the game’s epic roster of heroes, and discover the inspirations that shaped its art style. After setting the bar for arcade-inspired beat ‘em ups, Dotemu and Tribute Games modernize the timeless fun of brawlers with exciting tag-team fighting and a multi-era celebration of the most iconic comic book universe in MARVEL Cosmic Invasion. A masterful pixel art style perfectly embodies the spirit of classic MARVEL character designs, resulting in thrilling action that’d look right at home in an arcade cabinet. The highly anticipated beat 'em up will be arriving on PC, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch this year.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Official Behind the Scenes Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'One Week' Hype Trailer for Dispatch, a narrative-driven action choice-making strategy game developed by AdHoc Studio. Players will manage an unorthodox team of heroes to keep the city safe, all while balancing the trials and tribulations of conflicting personalities amongst the team. Embark on the ultimate journey towards embodying a hero in Dispatch, launching on October 22 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dispatch - Official 'One Week' Hype Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Prepare for some weird but adorable fun with The Battle Cats! In this special episode of IGN Plays, we're celebrating 11 years of this quirky mobile gacha game where you collect and lead an army of adorable, yet bizarre, cats. With surprising strategic depth, unique character designs, and a ton of 11th Anniversary rewards, this is the perfect time to play The Battle Cats  and join over 100 million players worldwide!

Presented by The Battle Cats, Play The Battle Cats now and redeem exclusive 11th Anniversary rewards.

#IGN
title: Let's Play The Battle Cats | Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the Demo Launch Trailer for Wizard Cats, an action roguelike crafting roguelike developed by Big Frogg Studios. Players will embody an elusive yet powerful wizard cat tasked with using the arcane arts to dispatch endless hordes of little animals. Collect mystical ruins, create spells, and more in Wizard Cats, coming soon to macOS and PC (Steam), with a demo available now for Steam as part of Steam Next Fest.
title: Wizard Cats - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Metro Rivals: New York announcement trailer for the upcoming train simulation game that blends strategy and story-driven action. Metro Rivals: New York will be available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S in 2026.

In Metro Rivals: New York, step into a near-future New York City where the subway system has been carved into 10 fiercely contested districts. Each is controlled by one or more of the five Track Titans--large-than-life celebrity drivers who dominate their territory with unrivaled skill, enormous social media influence, and unshakable reputations. These figures guard their turf with ferocity, and only the most talented newcomer has any chance of challenging their dominance. 

Begin your journey with nothing but a hand-me-down train and a determination to rise. To succeed, take on a variety of missions, earn cash fares, upgrade your train's performance, build a loyal following, and earn respect. This journe
title: Metro Rivals: New York - Official Announcement Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
From the easy-to-use Xbox Full Screen Experience to the excellent performance from the AMD Z2 Extreme, the Asus ROG Xbox Ally X is easily the best handheld gaming PC available right now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally X Review

author: IGN
description:
Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), featuring improved performance and loading times. Owners of the PS4 version get the upgrade for free. Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is also available on Xbox and PC. Watch the Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun launch trailer for this hardcore tactical stealth game set in Japan around the Edo period. Get a look at gameplay and more from this Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun trailer. In Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun, a new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills for assassination, sabotage and espionage.

#IGN #gaming
title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Official PS5 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Ambrosia Sky, a first-person sci-fi stylized action-adventure game developed by Soft Rains. Players can get the rundown of the game's systems and mechanics as they research a galactic catastrophe on Saturn's rings. Clean the contamination and escape in Abrosia Sky, with Act One launching on November 10 for PC and a demo available now.
title: Ambrosia Sky - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes, a sci-fi real-time strategy game developed by Alt Shift. The battle for survival is here, and the stakes have never been higher. Take command of one of the many fleets escaping the annihilation of the Twelve Colonies. Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN
title: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Story Trailer for Goodnight Universe, a narrative-based emotional cinematic game developed by Nice Dream. Players will awaken as a 6-month-old baby with a fully developed consciousness and psychic abilities to accompany it. Make sense of the family dynamics and an elusive tech corporation that's out to get you. Goodnight Universe is launching on November 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Goodnight Universe - Official Story Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

description:
Don't miss the Apophis DLC Reveal Trailer for Deadzone: Rogue, a first-person roguelite online shooter developed by Prophecy Games. Players can access all-new content with the upcoming Apophis DLC, bringing new challenges to overcome at the point where it all began. The free Apophis DLC for Deadzone: Rogue is coming soon for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN
title: Deadzone: Rogue - Official Apophis DLC Reveal Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Get a look at the Gameplay Trailer for The Outer Worlds 2, the sequel to the hit first-person sci-fi RPG developed by Obsidian Entertainment. Players will explore diverse locations with a new crew, weapons, and enemies to dispatch on a vibrant adventure with more to come post-launch. The Outer Worlds 2 is launching on October 29 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Battle.Net).
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
The Four Horsemen (Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Dave Franco, Isla Fisher) are back — to unite with a new generation of illusionists (Justice Smith, Dominic Sessa, Ariana Greenblatt) for their most global, high-stakes magical adventure yet. Their mission: Expose the corruption of Veronika Vanderberg (Rosamund Pike), a powerful diamond heiress with ties to arms dealers, traffickers, and warlords. 

Aided by the legendary Thaddeus (Morgan Freeman), the two generations of magicians must overcome their differences to try and defeat their cunning and dangerous adversary, in this magic-fueled heist filled with the franchise’s signature twists, turns, and thrilling reveals — along with some of the most thrilling illusions ever captured on film.
 
Now You See Me: Now You Don’t is directed by Ruben Fleischer (Venom, Uncharted, Zombieland), from a screenplay by Seth Grahame-Smith and Michael Lesslie and Paul Wernick & Rhett Reese, story by Eric Warren Singer, and based on characters created
title: Now You See Me: Now You Don’t Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Predator: Badlands takes the iconic sci-fi action series the furthest into the future it’s ever gone, and for the first time ever, the Predator is the good guy. Director Dan Trachtenberg, who also gave us 2022’s Prey and the animated anthology Predator: Killer of Killers, stopped by to explain his approach to expanding this beloved universe without losing sight of why it’s so beloved. He reveals the pop-culture inspirations for some of the gadgets wielded by Dek, the hero of Badlands, and how the film’s star Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi adapted to speaking the newly written Yautja language. Dan also reveals how long he’s been wanting a Predator video game, his first exposure to this franchise, and who he’d like to see the Predator fight - aside from Wolverine, Archie, Batman, Judge Dredd and the rest of the comic book characters he’s already thrown down with. Plus, Elle Fanning plays a Weyland-Yutani replicant (or half of one, anyway) so where does this fit in the Alien timeline al
title: How Predator: Badlands Was Inspired by James Bond and World of Warcraft | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Predator: Badlands, which stars Elle Fanning and Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi, is set in the future on a remote planet, where a young Predator, outcast from his clan, finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Fanning) and embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. 

The film is directed by Dan Trachtenberg (Prey) and produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt, Brent O’Connor.

Predator: Badlands opens exclusively in movie theaters on November 7 in IMAX, Dolby Cinema, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere.

#IGN
title: Predator: Badlands Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Step into Blue Protocol: Star Resonance, the latest anime MMO where you become the hero of your own story! This anime adventure lets you customize your character, explore the vast world of Regnus, dive into thrilling dungeons, and experience dynamic combat across eight unique classes – all while connecting with a global community of players. Blue Protocol: Star Resonance is available now on PC, iOS, and Android with full cross-play and progression.

Presented by Blue Protocol: Star Resonance. a brand new anime-style MMO.
Available Now on PC and Mobile!

#IGN
title: Blue Protocol: Star Resonance - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Play as Sarah Connor and the T-800 through a variety of thrilling missions as they take on the T-1000 and try to put a stop to Skynet’s plans before the human race is annihilated. 
Lead the Resistance as John Connor in the future, fighting on the front lines as mankind’s only hope in the War Against the Machines. In this unique story blending iconic scenes from ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide. 
Terminator 2D: NO FATE is coming to PS5, PS4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC (via Steam and the Epic Games Store) on November 26th, 2025.
title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE - Official No Fate Decision Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the Open World Gameplay Trailer for Where Winds Meet, an upcoming open-world action RPG developed by Everstone Studio. Players will explore a diverse set of landscapes from ancient 10th-century China, from lush, vibrant landscapes, bustling markets, serene palaces, and more. Discover more in Where Winds Meet, launching on November 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Where Winds Meet - Official Open World Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at the Nintendo Switch 2 Reveal Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, the hit narrative-driven classic RPG developed by Owlcat Games. Players will continue their adventure like never before to travel the galaxy, make key choices, and engage in tactical combat on the go with the Nintendo Switch 2. Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is coming soon to the Nintendo Switch 2, alongside the game being available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, macOS, and PC (Steam).

#IGN
title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Reveal Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Alpha Release Window Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy, a party-based adventure classic RPG developed by Owlcat Games. Players will head straight to deep and sinister conspiracies to make sense of them by leading investigations, engaging in methodical combat, and making key choices on behalf of the God-Emperor. Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy is launching an Alpha in Q4 2025, with a release coming soon for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy - Official Alpha Release Window Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
For the first time, Chainsaw Man slashes his way onto the big screen in an epic, action-fueled adventure that continues the hugely popular anime series. Denji worked as a Devil Hunter for the yakuza, trying to pay off the debt he inherited from his parents, until the yakuza betrayed him and had him killed. As he was losing consciousness, Denji’s beloved chainsaw-powered devil-dog, Pochita, made a deal with Denji and saved his life. This fused the two together, creating the unstoppable Chainsaw Man. Now, in a brutal war between devils, hunters, and secret enemies, a mysterious girl named Reze has stepped into his world, and Denji faces his deadliest battle yet, fueled by love in a world where survival knows no rules.


Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc is based on the original story “Chainsaw Man” by Tatsuki Fujimoto (Serialized in Shueisha’s “Shonen Jump+”).


The screenplay is by Hiroshi Seko. Production is by MAPPA.
title: Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc - Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Two conspiracy obsessed young men kidnap the high-powered CEO of a major company, convinced that she is an alien intent on destroying planet Earth.

Directed by Yorgos Lanthimos, Bugonia stars Emma Stone, Jesse Plemons, Aidan Delbis, Stavros Halkias, and Alicia Silverstone.

Focus Features will release Bugonia with a special limited engagement on October 24th, ahead of a wide expansion on October 31st.
title: Bugonia Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description: Cleaning sharks' teeth? No problem. Except when they wake up and devour your head. Check out brutal, terrifying gameplay from Shark Dentist and the various ways you can die in this trailer for the upcoming horror roguelike game. Take on the role of a shark dentist, where your task is to treat the teeth of giant predators in a dark clinic while avoiding their deadly aggression. Balance tactics, luck, and limited resources to heal your patient without losing your own life. Shark Dentist will be available on PC.
title: Shark Dentist - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Starring Tatiana Maslany and Rossif Sutherland, the film is set to open in theaters on November 14th, and is director Osgood Perkins’ third film with Neon, after 2025’s The Monkey, and 2024’s Longlegs.

#IGN
title: Keeper - Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Set in the world of Stephen King’s It universe, IT: Welcome To Derry is based on King’s “IT” novel and expands the vision established by filmmaker Andy Muschietti in the feature films IT and IT Chapter Two.

The series is developed for television by filmmakers Andy Muschietti and Barbara Muschietti (IT, IT Chapter Two, The Flash) and Jason Fuchs (IT Chapter Two, Wonder Woman, Argylle). Andy Muschietti directs multiple episodes of the original series.

The cast includes Jovan Adepo, Taylour Paige, Chris Chalk, James Remar, Stephen Rider, Madeleine Stowe, Rudy Mancuso, and Bill Skarsgård.

IT: Welcome To Derry, from Warner Bros. Television, debuting Sunday, October 26 at 9:00 p.m. ET/PT on HBO and will be available to stream on HBO Max. New episodes of the eight-episode season will debut weekly leading up to the season finale on Sunday, December 14.

#IGN
title: IT: Welcome To Derry Exclusive Teaser | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Four years ago, 13-year-old Finn killed his abductor and escaped, becoming the sole survivor of The Grabber. But true evil transcends death … and the phone is ringing again. 
 
Four-time Academy Award nominee Ethan Hawke returns to the most sinister role of his career as The Grabber seeks vengeance on Finn (Mason Thames) from beyond the grave by menacing Finn’s younger sister, Gwen (Madeleine McGraw). 
 
As Finn, now 17, struggles with life after his captivity, the headstrong 15-year-old Gwen begins receiving calls in her dreams from the black phone and seeing disturbing visions of three boys being stalked at a winter camp known as Alpine Lake. 
 
Determined to solve the mystery and end the torment for both her and her brother, Gwen persuades Finn to visit the camp during a winter storm. There, she uncovers a shattering intersection between The Grabber and her own family’s history. Together, she and Finn must confront a killer who has grown more powerful in death and more significant
title: Black Phone 2 - Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Christophe Gans, who directed 2006's Silent Hill, is back behind the camera for Return to Silent Hill, a sequel slated to arrive in theaters in 2026. Jeremy Irvine and Hannah Emily Anderson star in the sequel, which is based on Konami's Silent Hill 2.

The movie’s producers include Davis Films, Samuel Hadida, and Victor Hadida.

Return to Silent Hill will be released on January 23, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Movies
title: Return to Silent Hill Exclusive Behind the Scenes Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into how ranching works in this latest Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven trailer for the upcoming expansion for the cult simulator action roguelike game. In Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven, a lost God calls you from a mysterious mountain: you must rebuild the flock and reawaken winter to uncover the truth of the fallen lambs. Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven will be available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC in early 2026.

Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven features harsh weather to endure, including blizzards and freezing temperatures. Build new structures to keep your loyal followers warm and protect them from frostbite and famine. Unlock ranching at your Cult base and breed rare animals that provide wool, warmth and when times are particularly desperate, precious meat. Tame, ride and let your followers take care of these majestic creatures. Explore a new realm and battle through two vast new dungeons.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven - Official Ranching Overview Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
In visionary creator Bryan Fuller’s (“Hannibal,” “Pushing Daisies”) fantastical and wickedly inventive feature directorial debut Dust Bunny, a 10-year-old girl joins forces with her hit man neighbor to confront each other’s monsters. 

Ten-year-old Aurora has a mysterious neighbor (Mads Mikkelsen) who kills real-life monsters. He’s a hit man for hire. So, when Aurora needs help killing the monster she believes ate her entire family, she procures his services. Suspecting that her parents may have fallen victim to assassins gunning for him, Aurora’s neighbor guiltily takes the job. Now, to protect her, he’ll need to battle an onslaught of assassins ― and accept that some monsters are real. 

The cast also includes Sophie Sloan, Sigourney Weaver, and David Dastmalchian.

Dust Bunny opens in theaters on December 5, 2025.

#IGN
title: Dust Bunny - Exclusive Clip (2025) Mads Mikkelsen | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Oscar-winning director Guillermo del Toro adapts Mary Shelley’s classic tale of Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist who brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

The film stars Oscar Isaac, Jacob Elordi, Mia Goth, Felix Kammerer, David Bradley, Lars Mikkelsen, Christian Convery, with Charles Dance, and Christoph Waltz.

Frankenstein opens in select theaters on October 17 and premieres on Netflix on November 7.

#IGN
title: Frankenstein - Exclusive Clip | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest brutal The Outlast Trials trailer for the co-op action horror game to see what's coming with a Season 4 update, which brings the PvP Invasion Mode. The Invasion Initiative invites Reagents to alter the balance of power and don the mask of the Imposter, disguising themselves as their fellow peers. Prove your loyalty to Murkoff and stalk your fellow Reagents with a knife. Whichever end of the blade you're on, we're all getting better together. Steel yourself and prepare for this new Experimental Therapy in The Outlast Trials when Invasion begins on PC (Epic Games Store and Steam), PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S on October 21, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Outlast Trials - Official Invasion Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at the Developer Game Overview Trailer for Scott Pilgrim EX, a 2D action-adventure brawler developed by Tribute Games. Players will fight across time, space, and the streets of Toronto in all-out brawler combat. Join Bryan Lee O'Malley and Yannick Belzil to get a feel for what's in store for Scott Pilgrim EX, coming to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) in 2026.

#IGN
title: Scott Pilgrim EX - Official Developer Game Overview Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Starsand Island x My Time at Portia trailer as these two cozy, life simulation RPGs get a collaboration! The Starsand Island x My Time at Portia collaboration is coming to Xbox Series X/S, Xbox on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Steam.

Leave the hustle of the city behind and embrace life on Starsand Island. Fish, farm, raise animals, and befriend or fall in love with locals to learn their secrets. Customize your world with our DIY system, and invite friends to help build your dream paradise.

#IGN
title: Starsand Island x My Time at Portia - Official Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Prepare to blast mold away! Get a closer look at Moldwasher in this latest trailer for the upcoming cozy, arcade-style fridge-cleaning adventure. Take a peek at gameplay and learn about the messes you'll clean up as an adorable sushi roll in this new Moldwasher trailer. Equip your high-pressure spray, choose the right nozzle, and clear away sticky messes when Moldwasher launches on PC. Learn more and wishlist it on Steam, if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3688130/Moldwasher

#IGN
title: Moldwasher - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Developer Gameplay Overview Trailer for Hela, an action-adventure 3D puzzle game developed by Windup. Players will explore a Scandinavian-inspired setting through the very tiny eyes of a mouse on a grand adventure through nature. Hear from the developers about the core gameplay mechanics of Hela, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN
title: Hela - Official Developer Gameplay Overview Trailer | IGN Fall Fan Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the intro cinematic for Fellowship, the upcoming so-called Multiplayer Online Dungeon Adventure that aims to pluck out the team-based dungeon raids that are the beating heart of modern MMOs and turn them into a streamlined four-player co-op game – without the hundred hours of leveling up before you get to the best stuff. Fellowship will be released in Early Access for PC on October 16. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2352620/Fellowship/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Fellowship - Official Intro Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Toreador Trailer for Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, a vampiric action RPG developed by The Chinese Room. Players will discover the Clan of Divas with the Toreador characters of Seattle, fitted with "Celerity" and "Presence" as clan affinities, and "Cat's Grace" passive ability that allows for faster movement after feeding. 

Explore more of the Toreador characters in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #VampireTheMasquerade #ActionRPG
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Official Toreador Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Accolades Trailer for Metal Eden, a sci-fi action first-person shooter developed by Reikon Games. 

Players will fight for the consciousness of humanity by overcoming platforming through advanced parkour movement, cybernetic abilities, and powerful weapons to dispatch enemy after enemy. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Metal Eden, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #MetalEden #FPS
title: Metal Eden - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Season 2 Trailer for NBA 2K26, the latest addition to the acclaimed basketball simulation game developed by Visual Concepts. 

Players can soon gain access to new rewards and content with Season 2. Season 2 of NBA 2K26 is launching on October 17 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#IGN #NBA #BasketBall
title: NBA 2K26 - Official Season 2 Trailer

author: IGN
description: The official 1.0 release of Voidtrain, the first-person survival/crafting first-person shooter where you help crew an interdimensional train, with action taking place both on and off the rails, is arriving on PC and Xbox Series X|S on November 7. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159690/Voidtrain/
title: Voidtrain - Official 1.0 Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake producer Masaaki Hayasaka introduces this exclusive gameplay clip from the upcoming pair of HD-2D remakes in the legendary JRPG series, in which the player seeks to defeat the Dragonlord and rescue the kidnapped Princess Gwaelin. This remake bundle will be available on October 30 for PC, Nintendo Switch and Switch 2, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.
title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake: Rescuing Princess Gweaelin Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Full Screen Experience Teaser Trailer for ROG Xbox Ally, the latest hardware gaming PC developed in collaboration with ASUS and Xbox. 

Players can make use of the ROG Xbox Ally's specific benefits, such as a console-like full-screen interface that provides quieter background processes and optimizations. The ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X are available now.

#IGN #Xbox #XboxAlly
title: ROG Xbox Ally - Official Full Screen Experience Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 'The Vallis Undermind' Gameplay Launch Trailer for Warframe, the hit sci-fi action third-person game developed by Digital Extremes. 

Players can explore the depths below in the latest update with The Vallis Undermind, which tasks players with providing support for Nightcap. Take hold of a fungal network by using Nokko, a new mushroom-themed Warframe, and earn new customization in the process in Warframe's 'The Vallis Undermind' Update, available on October 15 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Warframe #ThirdPersonShooter
title: Warframe - Official 'The Vallis Undermind' Gameplay Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Cyberpunk 2077 captured on an ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X. 
Graphics settings were set to Low and the Ally X was plugged into its power source. 

00:00 - Graphics Settings
00:22 - Fightin Some Bad Dudes in the Desert
10:54 - Riding Around Night City
13:52 - Walking Around the Afterlife
title: Cyberpunk 2077 On The Xbox Handheld | ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X Gameplay

author: IGN
description: The Xbox Handheld has finally arrived! We got the chance to take a fresh new unit out of the box and inpect everything that comes with the $1000 sku. ASUS has partenered with Microsoft to bring us the first Xbox handheld gaming console in the form of a mobile Windows PC, named ROG Xbox Ally X. We also compare it side-by-side to Valve's Steam Deck and the Nintendo Switch 2 in order to compare looks, weight, and form factor.
title: ROG Xbox Ally X Unboxing

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Hogwarts Legacy captured on an ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X. 
Graphics settings were set to medium and the Ally X was plugged into its power source. 

00:00 - Graphics Settings
00:52 - Jackdaws Tomb
15:43 - Flying a Broom around Hogwarts
title: Hogwarts Legacy On The Xbox Handheld | ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Reveal Trailer for Rules of Engagement: The Grey State, an upcoming free-to-play PvEvP first-person Lovecraftian multiplayer extraction shooter developed by Grey Studio (formerly known as Aurora Studio). Players will explore a supernatural dimension as a Strider hired by an elusive organization to study the unstable dimension known as The Grey State. Race against the clock upon every entry into The Grey State to gather supplies, engage with horrifying monsters of the dimension, and make it out alive. Rules of Engagement: The Grey State is coming to PC (Steam) in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Rules of Engagement: The Grey State - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer for Rules of Engagement: The Grey State, an upcoming free-to-play PvEvP first-person Lovecraftian multiplayer extraction shooter developed by Grey Studio (formerly known as Aurora Studio). Players will head into the fray of a top-secret dimension as different classes, offering distinct playstyles to engage with deadly monsters or other combatants from game to game. Explore every corner of The Grey State, all while engaging in tactical shooting across an array of different weapons and equipment to secure a safe exit with valuable loot. Check out the latest trailer to see gameplay from Rules of Engagement: The Grey State, coming to PC (Steam) in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Rules of Engagement: The Grey State - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Nine Tails Puzzle Boxes are a brand-new collectible activity in Ghost of Yotei, exclusive to the Teshio Ridge region in northern Ezo. You’ll mostly find them inside Nine Tails–occupied areas and Inari Shrines. Each box requires you to slide tiles around in your Inventory menu to unlock it. In this video, we’ll show you the locations and solutions for all 12 Nine Tails Puzzle Boxes in Ghost of Yotei, so you can complete your collection and uncover every secret reward!

ghost of yotei, ghost of yotei puzzle boxes, ghost of yotei all puzzle boxes, ghost of yotei nine tails boxes, ghost of yotei nine tails puzzle boxes, ghost of yotei all nine tails boxes, ghost of yotei collectibles, ghost of yotei guide, ghost of yotei walkthrough, ghost of yotei tips, ghost of yotei secrets, ghost of yotei teshio ridge, ghost of yotei shrine puzzles, ghost of yotei all locations, ghost of yotei 100 percent completion, ghost of yotei nine tails, ghost of yotei puzzle box solutions, ghost of yotei in
title: Ghost of Yotei - All Puzzle Box Solutions | Nine Tails Puzzle Box Guide

author: IGN
description:
Check out the prelude anime short of Digimon Story Time Stranger which focuses on Inori and her younger brother just before the main story's events. Digimon Story Time Stranger is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam.

#IGN #DIgimon
title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger - Official Anime Short Prelude

author: IGN
description: Check out the Launch Trailer for NASCAR 25, the latest addition to the hit NASCAR racing simulation series developed by iRacing.com Motorsport Simulations. Players will get behind the wheel of powerful cars with iconic NASCAR drivers to take to the speedway and race for glory. Win in competitive online multiplayer or Career Mode with the NASCAR Cup Series, Xfinity Series, CRAFTSMAN Truck Series, and ARCA Menards Series. NASCAR 25 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S, with a release on November 11 for PC (Steam).
title: NASCAR 25 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Vlad is one of the strongest (and most chaotic) characters in Megabonk—if you build him right. In this video, we break down the best Vlad build in Megabonk we’ve found, showing you how to go from fragile fledgling vampire to an unstoppable lifestealing monster.

We’ll show you exactly how to dominate your runs with the right setup, covering the best weapons for both early and late game, the most effective Tomes to boost your Lifesteal and XP gain, the must-have Items like Chonkplate, Medkit, and Dice, and smart strategies to survive the early game while scaling into a true vampire god. By the end of this build, Vlad can literally go AFK while draining every enemy around him.

00:00 – Intro
00:29 – Vlad Gameplay Basics
01:10 – Best Weapons for Vlad
02:14 – Best Tomes for Vlad
03:41 – Best Items for Vlad
05:43 – Vlad Run Strategy

#IGN #Gaming #Megabonk
title: Megabonk: Vlad Build Guide – Ultimate Lifesteal and AFK Power Setup
